Plot: A London woman's love life and career both hinge, unknown to her, on whether or not she catches a train. We see it both ways, in parallel.
Title: Sliding Doors
Actors: Gwyneth Paltrow, John Hannah, John Lynch, Jeanne Tripplehorn
tomatoConsensus: Despite the gimmicky feel of the split narratives, the movie is watch-able due to the winning performances by the cast.
